abstract: Letter from Connecticut Rep Joe Courtney responds to October 2  Ezekiel J Emanuel and Bob Kocher Op-Ed column supporting so-called Cadillac tax provision of Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Representative Joe Courtney writes that the tax “damages the progress we have made since the Affordable Care Act was signed into law.”
snippet: Representative Joe Courtney writes that the tax “damages the progress we have made since the Affordable Care Act was signed into law.”

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
